Quickstrike:





Quickstrike glared at Dark Mouse with one bright crimson optic squinted. He 
thought it was rather odd to keep a pet rat, but everyone had their hobbies. 
He frowned a little. Rats were more food to him than pets.

"Well, alright," he said lowly. "Jus' make sure t' keep 'im in that cage." 
He looked at Stingtra. "We still goin'?"
